name: AirDash (JesusChrist69)
description:
Air Dash is a 60 second Platformer game.  Most of the playing level is randomly generated at runtime, so it's never quite the same.  Try to see how far you can go before time runs out!  You can restart the level and keep your stats and try again! 

I have been able to add a web build to this game!  Although there is a weird audio issue with the pickups that doesn't exist in the downloadable version of the game! 

Created for the One Minute Game Jam #6 hosted by warsugs
